“What’s the difference between having 200 million and 1 Billion?” I see lots of answers saying 800 million. While that’s materially correct, I think it doesn’t answer the question. I guess the intended question was: “does one feel different with 200 million and with one billion?” I guess it shouldn’t make much difference. But maybe it does when you have 200 million and your neighbour has one billion, a larger house, a larger ship, a larger swimming pool, a faster private jet…, and lots of other useless things.
